bill.summary:
Office of National Drug Control Policy Reauthorization Act of 2024
This bill reauthorizes through FY2031 the Office of National Drug Control Policy and related grants, programs, and initiatives such as
the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas program, the Drug-Free Communities program, the Drug Court Training and Technical Assistance program, andthe National Community Anti-Drug Coalition Institute.
